text.section: On payment of the appropriate license fee and, if applicable, receipt of the proof of the insurance required under § 12-501 of this title, the Board shall issue a license to each applicant who meets the requirements of this subtitle.

section.section: Any master plumber, journey plumber, or apprentice holding a valid license is eligible to participate in a Board-approved cross connection/backflow prevention certification program to be certified as an approved cross connection/backflow prevention technician.
Only a master plumber or journey plumber possessing certification shall be authorized to certify the installation and testing of mechanical cross connection control devices.

For the purpose of certification of the installation and testing of mechanical cross connection control devices, a local jurisdiction may adopt regulations or enact laws that have qualifications comparable to or more stringent than paragraph (2) of this subsection.
